plot: After turning the Fanlair into a rocket ship, Fanboy and Chum Chum crash land next door to their favorite superhero, Man-Arctica!

When the boys crash land on Planet Hasselhoth, their friendly visit with Man-Arctica results in the trio's capture by Man-Arctica's nemesis, Global Warmer./When Oz's new, vintage "Boom Bot" toy hypnotizes him into selling items whenever the doorbell to his shop rings, he ends up selling all of his collectors' items.
